name: moov-property-search
description: Property Search Platform with Flexible Import System

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:api" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:embedding"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd property-search-api && npm install && cd ../property-search-frontend && npm install && cd ../property-embedding-service && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.build:all: cd property-search-api && npm run build && cd ../property-search-frontend && npm run build
scripts.clean: rmdir /s /q node_modules & cd property-search-api && rmdir /s /q node_modules & cd ../property-search-frontend && rmdir /s /q node_modules
scripts.kill-ports: for /f "tokens=5" %a in ('netstat -ano ^| findstr :3000') do taskkill /f /pid %a & for /f "tokens=5" %b in ('netstat -ano ^| findstr :3001') do taskkill /f /pid %b & for /f "tokens=5" %c in ('netstat -ano ^| findstr :8000') do taskkill /f /pid %c
